other_tests.findings: Increased latency in the central components of upper limb potentials; altered potentials in lower limbs.
Greater delay in the lower limbs compared to the upper limbs.
Bilateral hypometabolism in the paramedian frontal, anterior parietal, and temporal lobes.
Decreased cortisol basal level (3.8 mg/dL); increased basal ACTH level (1,945 pg/mL) with negative anti-21-hydroxylase antibodies, consistent with nonautoimmune adrenal insufficiency.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Six-month follow-up indicated progression with increased walking difficulties and pain.
